Tests that deprecation issues are reported for <img browsingtopics>.

Inspector issue: {
    issue : {
        code : DeprecationIssue
        details : {
            deprecationIssueDetails : {
                affectedFrame : {
                    frameId : <string>
                }
                sourceCodeLocation : {
                    columnNumber : 0
                    lineNumber : -1
                    url : https://a.test:8443/inspector-protocol/resources/empty.html
                }
                type : Topics
            }
        }
    }
}
